channel.title: Upper left hand corner
channel.description: Is there ANY way to change what it says in the upper left hand corner of the screen when you scroll over...Say...Something in the quest log, skills menu, etc? Or is this client sided...Even so...Is it possible? Because when I scroll over the quests I'm making...I don't want it to say in the corner "black knights' fortress"...

item.title: Upper left hand corner
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Where at…? x.x

(I also wanted the quest to light up when you scroll over it…Like in rs…x.x…)

Read full topic

item.title: Upper left hand corner
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Of course there is. You’d want to take a look at the client to identify the process in which this occurs.

Read full topic
